title: AI learns to make bubble tea

panels.scene_description: A brightly lit bubble tea shop. A sweating, slightly overweight man (the owner) nervously watches an AI robot expertly making bubble tea behind the counter. The robot is sleek and modern.
panels.narrative_function: Introduces the setting, characters, and the central conflict: AI competition.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, Panel 1: A bubble tea shop. A sweating, overweight man nervously watches an AI robot expertly making bubble tea. The robot is sleek.

panels.scene_description: Close-up on the robot's arm pouring pearls into a cup with incredible precision. The owner is looking on with increasing anxiety, wiping sweat from his brow.
panels.dialogue: Owner: (Thinking) My secret family recipe...reduced to algorithms!
panels.narrative_function: Develops the conflict, showing the AI's efficiency and the owner's fear.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, Panel 2: Close-up on the robot's arm pouring pearls into a cup. The owner looks on with anxiety, wiping sweat from his brow.

panels.scene_description: A customer approaches the counter. The robot slides a perfect bubble tea towards them with a small mechanical arm. The customer smiles approvingly.
panels.dialogue: Customer: Wow! Best bubble tea I've ever had! And no awkward small talk!
panels.narrative_function: The turning point: Customer prefers the AI's efficiency and lack of human interaction.
panels.english_prompt: cartoon style, 4-panel comic, clear characters, Panel 3: A customer approaches the counter. The robot slides a bubble tea towards them. The customer smiles approvingly.

panels.scene_description: The owner is now outside the shop, dressed in a futuristic robot suit, badly made. He holds a sign that says "Human-Made Bubble Tea! (Slightly Less Efficient!)"
panels.dialogue: Owner: (Sighing) If you can't beat them...
panels.narrative_function: The resolution: The owner attempts to adapt in a humorous and ironic way.

overall_style: Humorous and satirical, suitable for adults.
